fullText: Ms. Riseborough and Mr. Morse are both accomplished actors, but they can't overcome the essential implausibility of Mr. Stephens's premise, which asks us to believe that a seventy-five-year-old man would fall in love with a mercurial stranger half his age who accosts him without warning.
